participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Introverted and creative, with a passion for technology and gaming.
participant_1.background: i'm working on a building a robot to be my body double. i've an allergy to water. i helped design the game starcraft. i am a famous twitch streamer. i am a recluse.

participant_2.background: i am a construction worker. i've 5 cats. my cats are very special to me. my dad taught me everything i know.

content.text: Hey! Are you a recluse? Because I am.
I have never been too one.
